title: Diamond Resorts International(R) -- Vacations for Life(R) -- Sugary Beaches, Breathtaking Reefs and Romantic Sunsets -- Maui Has It All
text:
SOURCE: DiamondResorts.com September 29, 2015 18:39 ET Diamond Resorts International® -- Vacations for Life® -- Sugary Beaches, Breathtaking Reefs and Romantic Sunsets -- Maui Has It All 
LAS VEGAS, NV --(Marketwired - September 29, 2015) - Ah, Maui. Is there anything quite like the white sand beaches, sapphire blue water, lush tropical flora and exotic wildlife? The Hawaiian island has been known for decades as a classic paradise and Diamond Resorts International® Ka'anapali Beach Club is one of the best ways to experience it. Situated on Maui's western shore, the hotel provides a breathtaking panoramic view of the land and sea, while on the inside, the rooms are a sumptuous feast of affordable luxury and hospitality. The vast richness of the resort grounds makes it possible to never even leave the property, yet still experience a wonderful Hawaiian vacation, whether it's with the family or a romantic partner. 
Dive beneath the waves to explore the rich aquatic diversity. Charter a whale-watching excursion, wander the gorgeous land on a hike, take an awesome helicopter tour, or become one with nature while horseback riding -- the options are endless in Maui. Then, when you're in the mood for more civilized comforts, enjoy a sumptuous meal at one of the many fine local restaurants or take in a spectacular show. Of course, back at the resort, you can relax with an amazing acre-sized swimming pool and outdoor cafés nestled among verdant garden atriums and peaceful waterfalls. Diamond Resorts International® Ka'anapali Beach Club offers a BBQ area for enjoying good times with new friends, and there's always the indulgence of a massage or a visit to the spa. 
Rooms at the Ka'anapali Beach Club are beautifully appointed and equipped with every modern device one could possible need, like broadband Internet, cable TV, and a DVD/Blue-ray player. Each room features a king-sized bed, a sofa bed with Tempur-Pedic mattress, and a full bathroom enhanced by oversized whirlpool tubs, a garden bath, and a walk-in shower. The partial kitchen allows freedom and convenience with a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, and coffee maker for a home-style approach to vacationing. The balcony/lanai is an inviting place to enjoy your morning coffee at sunrise or share a romantic moment at sunset. 
Diamond Resorts International ® Ka'anapali Beach Club may just be the trip of a lifetime, offering full immersion into the endless bounty of Hawaii. By building memories that will last a lifetime, it's one more way to ensure that visitors to Maui can always Stay Vacationed.™ 
About Diamond Resorts International® 
Diamond Resorts International ®, with its network of more than 330 vacation destinations located in 34 countries throughout the continental United States, Hawaii, Canada, Mexico, the Caribbean, South America, Central America, Europe, Asia, Australasia and Africa, provides guests with choice and flexibility to let them create their dream vacation, whether they are traveling an hour away or around the world. Our relaxing vacations have the power to give guests an increased sense of happiness and satisfaction in their lives, while feeling healthier and more fulfilled in their relationships, by enjoying memorable and meaningful experiences that let them Stay Vacationed.™ 
Diamond Resorts International ® manages vacation ownership resorts and sells vacation ownership points that provide members and owners with Vacations for Life® at over 330 managed and affiliated properties and cruise itineraries.
